introduction.title: ITLead - Platform for Frontend Interview Preparation
introduction.welcome: your reliable assistant in interview preparation!
introduction.description: We understand that preparing for a frontend developer interview can be challenging. Web technologies are constantly evolving, competition in the job market is growing, and it's important to be ready for all questions. That's why we created this platform to help you not only refresh your knowledge of key aspects of frontend development, but also gain practical experience in solving typical tasks that you might encounter in interviews.
introduction.platformDescription: is a platform that combines theoretical knowledge and practical tasks so you can prepare for interviews as effectively as possible.

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.text: — is your guide to the most important topics in frontend development. Here you'll find answers to popular questions often asked in interviews.
knowledgeBase.react: Virtual DOM, hooks, JSX and much more

problemsDatabase.title: Problems Database
problemsDatabase.text: — is practical assignments that will help you consolidate knowledge and prepare for real interviews.
problemsDatabase.jsProblemsDesc: Problems that test JavaScript knowledge from real interviews.
problemsDatabase.quizzes: What will be logged to the console?
problemsDatabase.quizzesDesc: You know those tricky interview questions where you have to say what will be printed to the console? They can involve the event loop, closures, promises, prototypes, reference types, and other JavaScript quirks.
problemsDatabase.reactProblemsDesc: Problems that test React knowledge from real interviews.
problemsDatabase.feature1: Solve problems directly on the platform with built-in IDE
problemsDatabase.feature3: Problems from real interviews at top companies

knowledgeCheck.title: Knowledge Check
knowledgeCheck.text: — is like "flash cards" for language learning, but for frontend interview preparation.
knowledgeCheck.categories: Breakdowns by categories: JavaScript, React, HTML/CSS and other topics

whyChoose.title: Why choose ITLead?
whyChoose.upToDateDesc: : We regularly update content so you stay current with the latest trends in web development.
whyChoose.practicalDesc: : Theory + tasks + knowledge check = confidence in interviews.
whyChoose.convenienceDesc: : All materials are structured and available in one place.
whyChoose.freeDesc: : Full access to all materials without restrictions.

howToGetStarted.title: How to get started?
howToGetStarted.step1Desc: : Refresh theory and learn new concepts on topics that interest you.
howToGetStarted.step2Desc: : Practice on real examples from interviews.
howToGetStarted.step3Desc: : Go through questions by selected categories and track progress.
howToGetStarted.step4Desc: : Confidently answer questions and solve tasks.
howToGetStarted.telegramDesc: — connect with like-minded developers and share experiences!
howToGetStarted.youtubeDesc: — we interview experienced developers from top companies who share their career paths and professional insights!

tip.title: Tip from professionals:
tip.text: Start with the knowledge base to refresh theory, then move on to practice — solve problems and check your knowledge. This way you can confidently answer questions and solve tasks in interviews!

actions.signInToMark: Sign in to mark as read
